What is a Heat Pump and How Does it Work?

A heat pump is a device that transfers heat from one location to another, providing both heating and cooling to your home. In the winter, it extracts heat from the outside air and transfers it to your home, while in the summer, it reverses the process, removing heat from your home and releasing it outside. Regular furnace service Denver, CO can also ensure your heating system is working efficiently.
